key_risks: Economic sensitivity tied to housing market and consumer spending
Supply chain disruptions including material shortages and increased freight costs
Environmental scrutiny over waste management and resource usage
controversies: Involvement in employment-related lawsuits such as Couch v. American Woodmark Corp. and Delawder v. American Woodmark
Recent insider selling raising concerns about management confidence
environmental_issues: Scrutiny over environmental impact despite sustainability initiatives
Progress on 'Path to Sustainability 2030' goals remains under watch
social_issues: Labor shortages and difficulties in recruiting and retaining skilled workers
Employment-related lawsuits highlighting potential labor practice risks
governance_issues: Insider selling potentially indicating lack of confidence in near-term performance
